PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09262011-09-22,  HC,  ,  , 
ActTobacco Act
SubjectPromotion of Tobacco Products and Accessories Regulations (Prohibited Terms)
PrecisPROMOTION OF TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND ACCESSORIES REGULATIONS (Prohibited Terms), in order to prohibit the use of the terms “light” and “mild”, and variations thereof, from various tobacco products, their packaging, advertising, promotions, retail displays, as well as from tobacco accessories.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0178 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
